author: IGN
description:
The newest entry into the Poohniverse follows Wendy Darling as she strikes out in an attempt to rescue her brother Michael from the clutches of the evil Peter Pan who intends to send him to Neverland. Along the way she meets a twisted Tinkerbell, who is hooked on what she thinks is fairy dust.

#IGN #Movies
title: Peter Pan's Neverland Nightmare - Official Trailer (2025) Megan Placito, Martin Portlock

author: IGN
description: Check out the latest Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 and Warzone trailer. Let the festive spirit move you and unwrap merry Call of Duty Maps, Modes, Operators, and more with a holiday twist.
title: Call of Duty: Warzone & Black Ops 6 - Official Holiday Festivities Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In this Indiana Jones and the Great Circle video, we take you through every main story cutscene in the game in order in 4K. This covers the opening intro all the way to the ending credits.

Timestamps
Peru
00:00 - Intro
00:20 - Spooky statue
01:01 - More warning signs
01:47 - Indy senses the double cross
02:59 - Entering the temple
03:32 - Spiders and finding Forrestal
04:55 - A friendly hug and finding The Golden Idol
06:16 - Time to make an escape
Marshall College
07:50 - Awaking from a nightmare
08:52 - Fighting a mysterious giant
10:23 - Indy wakes up from his fight
11:22 - Figuring out what was stolen and planning the next adventure
12:57 - We're off to The Vatican
Vatican City
15:21 - Meeting Antonio and planning the next steps
23:49 - Getting our camera from Ernesto
25:19 - Analyzing the photos with Antonio
27:29 - A giant discovery
30:36 - Following the nun
31:29 - Meeting Gina and Voss
34:45 - Getting Gina's help
35:42 - The treasury must be found
37:44 - The Vatican's treas
title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle - All Main Story Cutscenes (Full Movie) in 4K

author: IGN
description: A couple celebrates their son's birthday in the middle of the ocean on their boat. A violent storm hits and it brings up hungry creatures from the depths and they fight for their survival. Emilie Dequenne, Andreas Pietschmann, Lisa Delamar, Lucas Ebel, and Arben Bajraktaraj star in director Frédéric Jardin's film, which Samuel Goldwyn Films will release on January 10, 2025.
title: Survive - Exclusive Trailer (2025)

author: IGN
description: Check out the latest trailer for Street Fighter 6 that showcases how you can perform M. Bison's moves with the fighting game's modern control scheme. The trailer gives us a look at moves like Psycho Chrusher, Shadow Rise, and more.
title: Street Fighter 6 - Official M. Bison: Modern Controls Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Explore the open seas and uncover the kingdom’s dark secrets as you platform your way across dozens of locales, upgrading your gear every step of the way!

Demon Tides is set to launch on PC in 2025. Be sure to visit Steam and add it to your wishlist!

#IGN #Gaming
title: Demon Tides - Official Announcement Trailer | Day of the Devs 2024

author: IGN
description:
FELTOPIA is a cozy take on the arcade side-scroller, set in a hand-felted wooly world brought to life with stop-motion animation. Sky is a magical sheep herder who must harness their growing powers to save the Rainbow Flock and purge an insidious Smog Spirit that is engulfing the land.

#IGN #Gaming
title: FELTOPIA - Official Announcement Trailer | Day of the Devs 2024

author: IGN
description:
Explore the ECA a world torn apart by war and a mysterious cataclysmic event that left it uninhabitable by humans. Where humans must “tele-project” their minds into drones in order to survive and pillage the remains of a once great society.
TankHead is available now on the Epic Games Store.
title: TankHead - Official Launch Trailer | Day of the Devs 2024

author: IGN
description:
A scientist uses a unique teleportation instrument to escape an ancient biomechanical world filled with imaginative technology, deadly traps, and hidden secrets.

Bionic Bay will be released on March 13, 2025, for PC via Steam and PlayStation 5.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Bionic Bay - Official Release Date Announcement Trailer | Day of the Devs 2024

author: IGN
description:
Light the fuse in Fortnite’s newest Tactical FPS: Fortnite Ballistic. Check out the Fortnite: Ballistic launch trailer for this new first-person Fortnite experience. Ballistic is an adrenaline-filled, round-based 5v5 competitive game mode where strategy, tactical teamwork, and individual prowess are essential for victory. 

Fortnite: Ballistic is available now in Early Access with Ranked and Unranked.

#IGN #Gaming #Fortnite
title: Fortnite: Ballistic - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Enter the Overgrowth, a new realm in the world of Hyper Light. Play alone or with friends to explore open worlds, create new builds, rip through hordes and overcome the Crowns and the Abyss King.
Hyper Light Breaker is officially set to launch in Steam Early Access on January 14, 2025.
title: Hyper Light Breaker - Official Early Access Release Date Reveal Trailer | Day of the Devs 2024

author: IGN
description:
Join IGN's Mark Medina and his nephew Jaxon as they check out the new trailer for Sonic The Hedgehog 3. Sonic (Ben Schwartz), Tails (Colleen O'Shaughnessey), Knuckles (Idris Elba), and Dr. Robotnik (Jim Carrey) are back for their biggest adventure yet, facing an opponent unlike any they've seen before - Shadow the Hedgehog - voiced by Keanu Reeves! To understand just who Shadow is, Mark and Jaxson are also going hands-on with 2001's Sonic Adventure 2, and 2024's Sonic x Shadow Generations. The question is... Who can complete the levels faster?

Presented by Sonic The Hedgehog 3.

#IGN
title: 9-Year-Old Reacts to Sonic The Hedgehog 3

author: IGN
title: The latest Sonic 3 trailer is popular with adults and kids alike. Presented by #Sonic3Movie

author: IGN
description:
Check out the You're Cordially Invited trailer for this upcoming comedy movie starring Will Ferrell, Reese Witherspoon, Geraldine Viswanathan, Meredith Hagner, Jimmy Tatro, Stony Blyden, Leanne Morgan, Rory Scovel, Keyla Monterroso Mejia, Ramona Young, Jack McBrayer and Celia Weston.

When two weddings are accidentally booked on the same day at the same venue, each bridal party is challenged with preserving their family’s special moment while making the most of the unanticipated tight quarters. In a hilarious battle of determination and grit, the father of the bride (Will Ferrell) and sister of the other bride (Reese Witherspoon) chaotically go head-to-head as they stop at nothing to uphold an unforgettable celebration for their loved ones.

You're Cordially Invited is produced by Nicholas Stoller p.g.a., Conor Welch, Reese Witherspoon, Lauren Neustadter, Will Ferrell, and Jessica Elbaum. Alex Brown, Brendan O'Brien, and Ted Gidlow serve as executive producers.

You're Cordially Invi
title: You're Cordially Invited - Official Trailer (2025) Will Ferrell, Reese Witherspoon

author: IGN
description:
Watch as Sonic, Knuckles, and Tails help Santa save Christmas in this 'A Very Sonic Christmas' animated video, featuring a surprise twist at the end. Sonic the Hedgehog 3 is an upcoming movie starring Jim Carrey, Ben Schwartz, James Marsden, Tika Sumpter, Idris Elba, Colleen O’Shaughnessey, Natasha Rothwell, Shemar Moore, Adam Pally, Lee Majdoub, newcomers Alyla Browne and Krysten Ritter, with Keanu Reeves joining the franchise as Shadow the Hedgehog.

Sonic the Hedgehog returns to the big screen this holiday season in his most thrilling adventure yet. Sonic, Knuckles, and Tails reunite against a powerful new adversary, Shadow, a mysterious villain with powers unlike anything they have faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, Team Sonic must seek out an unlikely alliance in hopes of stopping Shadow and protecting the planet.

Sonic the Hedgehog 3, directed by Jeff Fowler, opens in theaters on December 20, 2024.

#Sonic #SonicTheHedgehog3 #Movies
title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3 - Official 'A Very Sonic Christmas' Featurette (2024) Ben Schwartz, Idris Elba

author: IGN
description: Check out the trailer for UniVersus card game set, Critical Role: Heroes of Exandria. This new addition to UniVersus brings a wealth of adventures, challenges, and fan-favorite characters straight from the world of Critical Role.
title: Critical Role x UniVersus - Official Heroes of Exandria Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Check out this behind-the-scenes look at the making of Venom: The Last Dance with the cast and filmmakers ahead of its upcoming home entertainment release.

Venom: The Last Dance is available to buy or rent on digital December 10 and on 4K UHD, Blu-ray & DVD January 21. This exclusive edition includes all three Venom films on 4K UHD/Blu-ray and digital, hours of special features, and limited edition, collectible action figure.

In Venom: The Last Dance, Tom Hardy returns as Venom, one of Marvel’s greatest and most complex characters, for the final film in the trilogy. Eddie and Venom are on the run. Hunted by both of their worlds and with the net closing in, the duo is forced into a devastating decision that will bring the curtains down on Venom and Eddie's last dance. 

Venom: The Last Dance stars Tom Hardy, Chiwetel Ejiofor, Juno Temple, Rhys Ifans, Stephen Graham, Peggy Lu and Alanna Ubach. The film is directed by Kelly Marcel from a screenplay she wrote, based on a story by Hardy
title: Venom: The Last Dance - Exclusive Behind the Scenes Clip (2024) Tom Hardy

author: IGN
description: Get your first look at Project Citadel, which its developers at Last Keep (a studio comprised of former Ensemble Studios staff) describe as a "real-time strategy, sci-fi roguelike where fast-paced action combat meets deep, strategic squadron management." It's coming to PC via Steam Early Access in 2025. Wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2929040/Project_Citadel/
title: Project Citadel - Official Teaser Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Donkey Kong is back and barreling through the jungle! Get a deep dive into Donkey Kong Country Returns HD in this overview trailer for the upcoming 2D platformer game. The Donkey Kong Country Returns HD trailer showcases various locations you'll explore, including the factory and volcano. We also get to see gameplay, the Kongs' special moves, how you can hitch a ride on Rambi, unlock secret levels, the Modern Mode, and more. Donkey Kong Country Returns HD will be available on Nintendo Switch on January 16, 2025.

Help DK and his pal Diddy Kong in 2D platforming action as they chase down the Tiki Tak Tribe to recover their precious banana hoard. With 80 levels across nine worlds to explore, two-player co-op to change up the action, and Modern Mode for extra hearts and other goodies, you'll be running, jumping, riding, and rolling through enemies on an adventure fit for a Kong!

#DonkeyKong #Nintendo #Gaming
title: Donkey Kong Country Returns HD - Official Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Some of the last big games of 2024 have finally dropped, including the open-world dress-up game Infinity Nikki, which is currently a PS5 console exclusive where you explore a vast world and play dress up. Its kinda like Elden Ring...but instead of sadness and dying a lot, you find new dresses and have a cat companion. It may sound weird but trust us when we say that it's definitely worth checking out. This week’s show is Max Scoville, Jada Griffin, Brian Altano, and is produced by Nick Maillet. 

Join our Facebook group at - facebook.com/groups/podcastbeyond/

#InfinityNikki #Gaming #EldenRing
title: Infinity Nikki is Like Elden Ring on Zoloft - Beyond Clips

author: IGN
description:
Watch as Team Sonic takes on Shadow in this action-packed clip.
Sonic the Hedgehog returns to the big screen this holiday season in his most thrilling adventure yet. Sonic, Knuckles, and Tails reunite against a powerful new adversary, Shadow, a mysterious villain with powers unlike anything they have faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, Team Sonic must seek out an unlikely alliance in hopes of stopping Shadow and protecting the planet.
title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3 - Official "He Took Us All At Once" Clip (2024) Keanu Reeves, Ben Schwartz

author: IGN
description: SkyDust is set in a cyberpunk universe, taking place in a future where society has collapsed following a global disaster, and the lines between morality and ethics have become blurred. Explore the neon cyberpunk world in this SkyDust trailer for the upcoming action-adventure game. SkyDust will be available on PC.
title: SkyDust - Official Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase

author: IGN
title: IGN’s Game of the Year nominees are…

author: IGN
title: Marvel Rivals review

author: IGN
title: Sonic meets Shadow in Sonic 3

title: Is Cillian Murphy playing a zombie in 28 Years Later?

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the trailer for Below Rusted Gods, a first-person experimental psychological horror game developed by FromSouthGames. Players will embody an operator helping an expedition through a hole descending into the unknown. Investigate surroundings and solve puzzles to get to the bottom of the mystery. Below, Rusted Gods is coming to PC (Steam) in Q1 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Below, Rusted Gods - Official Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the trailer for Dark Dawn: Chronicles of a Doll, a first-person action horror game developed by Warani Studios. Players will embark on a chilling journey coupled with the power of Unreal Engine 5. Explore a variety of settings with surreal imagery and additions throughout the game. Dark Dawn: Chronicles of a Doll is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Dark Dawn: Chronicles of a Doll - Official Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase

author: IGN
description:
Check out the gameplay trailer for Kernel Hearts, an action hack-and-slash roguelike developed by Ephemera Games. Players will harness magical abilities to slay gods in an attempt to save a world that's on the brink of oblivion. Kernel Hearts is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Kernel Hearts - Official Gameplay Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the reveal trailer for Knock Off, an action-figure fighting game developed by Mechaghidora. Players will duke it out as an action figure and throw hands with other action figures in the ultimate showdown for toy supremacy. Master combos, anticipate enemy moves, and claim victory across an array of stages. Knock Off is coming soon to PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox, and PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Knock Off - Official Reveal Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase

author: IGN
description:
Watch the gameplay trailer for Kraino Rebirth, a pixel-based 2D platformer developed by GameAtomic. Wield a devastating scythe, shoot oppositions along the path, and master platforming mechanics to survive this non-linear Metroidvania experience. Kraino Rebirth is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
title: Kraino Rebirth - Official Gameplay Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase

author: IGN
description: Watch the cinematic trailer for Mark of the Deep, a pirate exploration Metroidvania developed by Mad Mimic. Players will embark on a journey to explore the mysteries of a cursed island and find your missing pirate crew with Soulslike elements. Mark of the Deep is coming soon to PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).
title: Mark of the Deep - Official Cinematic Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase

author: IGN
description: Watch the trailer for Project Timi Sasha's Curse, a 3D rhythmic puzzle action game developed by Ephemeral Cube. Players will use rhythmic music to engage magic traps, fight enemies, and explore dream worlds to reveal the secrets within Lucity Town. Project Timi Sasha's Curse is coming soon to Nintendo Switch and PC (Steam).
title: Project Timi: Sasha's Curse - Official Trailer #2 | Latin American Games Showcase

author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest Pioner trailer to see action-packed gameplay from this post-apocalyptic MMO first-person shooter developed by GFA Games. Pioner immerses players in a grim and expansive world where survival depends on exploration, crafting, and smart resource management. Combining MMO, Survival, and FPS elements, the game offers engaging PvE missions, competitive PvP zones, unique crafting systems, a vast arsenal of weapons, character progression supporting a variety of playstyles, and a richly developed story. Pioner will be available on PC via Steam in 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Pioner - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Cyberpunk 2077's Patch 2.2 update is available now on PC, PS5, and Xbox Series consoles, and CD Projekt Red has once again expanded players' customization options in the game as they explore Night City in style. Here's an overview of all the biggest changes in Cyberpunk's 2.2 update.

#IGN #Gaming #Cyberpunk2077
title: Cyberpunk 2077 - Biggest Changes in Patch 2.2 Update
